DOC.detailed_description: TACE sorafenib Group Sorafenib administrate dose 400mg o.d . first TACE . After 2days drug rest , TACE conduct . Sorafenib resume dose 400mg o.d . 3 day TACE ( resumption day postpone 21 day TACE ) . When tolerability confirm 1 week resumption , dose sorafenib increase 400mg b.i.d . When tumor increase , TACE repeat . Control group TACE conduct schedule day . When tumor increase , TACE repeat . The treatment regimen continue untreatable progression define follow : - Child-Pugh grade C - Tumor growth ( 125 percent baseline status ) - Vascular invasion ( Vp3 , Vp4 ) - Extra hepatic spread size 10mm
